com.etshost.msu.bean

Class XmlRpcWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.etshost.msu.bean.XmlRpcWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.etshost.msu.xmlrpc.IXmlRpcHandler

    @Service(value="msu")
public class XmlRpcWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.etshost.msu.xmlrpc.IXmlRpcHandler
    The purpose of this class is to wrap around the XmlRpcHandler class. Wrapping around this class is necessary because spring AOP proxying and injection interferes with XMLRPC's reflection of public methods in the Handler.
